testcase.classname: As a user/administrator, I should be able to create a new customer record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: When a POST body consisting of valid data (first_name,last_name, email, password, password_confirmation, user_type, referral_code)
testcase.system-out: * The api user constructs the base url with the "customer" token............passed * The api user sets "api/register" path parameters..........................passed * The api user prepares a POST request containing the "registerApi", "TestApi", "123123123", "123123123", "customer", "0101010101" information to send to the api register endpoint..passed * The api user sends the "post" request and saves the "Response"............passed * The api user verifies that for "post" request type the status code is 201 and the message information in the response body is "Successfully registered".passed

testcase.classname: As a user/administrator, I should be able to create a new customer record in the system via API connection.
testcase.name: The creation of a customer via API should be verified to confirm whether the customer exists in the customer list using API connection.
testcase.failure:
* The api user constructs the base url with the "admin" token...............passed * The api user sets "api/get-users" path parameters.........................passed * The api user sends the "get" request and saves the "Response".............passed * The api user verifies the content of the data id in the response body.....failed
